languages.text: "Для подданных вы должны стать и тираном, и другом, и шутом. Главное — точно чувствовать, когда кем следует быть".

traits.locale_text: "Для подданных вы должны стать и тираном, и другом, и шутом. Главное — точно чувствовать, когда кем следует быть".

languages.text: "One must be a tyrant, a friend, and a jester to one's subjects. What matters is that to clearly discern which role is required at a given moment."
languages.original_text: "Для подданных вы должны стать и тираном, и другом, и шутом. Главное — точно чувствовать, когда кем следует быть".

traits.locale_text: "One has to be a tyrant, a friend and a jester to their subjects. What matters is that you clearly understand which role is appropriate at a given moment."
"One has to be a tyrant, a friend and a jester to their subjects. What matters is that you clearly understand which role is appropriate at a given moment."
"One must be a tyrant, a friend, and a jester to one's subjects. What matters is that to clearly discern which role is required at a given moment."
"One must be a tyrant, a friend, and a jester to one's subjects. What matters is that to clearly discern which role is required at a given moment."
"One must be a tyrant, a friend, and a jester to one's subjects. What matters is that to clearly discern which role is required at a given moment."

languages.text: “一个人必须既是暴君，又是朋友，还得是臣民的小丑。最重要的是，要能清楚地分辨出哪种时候需要扮演哪种角色。”
languages.original_text: "One must be a tyrant, a friend, and a jester to one's subjects. What matters is that to clearly discern which role is required at a given moment."

traits.locale_text: “一个人必须既是暴君，又是朋友，还得是臣民的小丑。最重要的是，要能清楚地分辨出哪种时候需要扮演哪种角色。”

languages.text: «Es necesario ser tirano, amigo y bufón con los súbditos. Lo importante es determinar qué función cumplir en cada momento».
languages.original_text: "One must be a tyrant, a friend, and a jester to one's subjects. What matters is that to clearly discern which role is required at a given moment."

traits.locale_text: «Es necesario ser tirano, amigo y bufón con los súbditos. Lo importante es determinar qué función cumplir en cada momento».

languages.text: 「人は臣下にとって暴君であり、友人であり、道化でなければならない。重要なのは、特定の瞬間にどの役割が必要かを明確に見極めることだ」
languages.original_text: "One must be a tyrant, a friend, and a jester to one's subjects. What matters is that to clearly discern which role is required at a given moment."

traits.locale_text: 「人は臣下にとって暴君であり、友人であり、道化でなければならない。重要なのは、特定の瞬間にどの役割が必要かを明確に見極めることだ」

languages.text: "Ihr müsst für Eure Untertanen Tyrann, Freund und Narr sein. Wichtig ist, klar festzulegen, welche Rolle in jedem Augenblick erforderlich ist."
languages.original_text: "One must be a tyrant, a friend, and a jester to one's subjects. What matters is that to clearly discern which role is required at a given moment."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst für Eure Untertanen Tyrann, Freund und Narr sein. Wichtig ist, klar festzulegen, welche Rolle in jedem Augenblick erforderlich ist."

languages.text: « Pour le bien de ses sujets, il faut parfois agir en tyran, en ami ou en bouffon. L'important, c'est de savoir quand incarner quel rôle. »
languages.original_text: "One must be a tyrant, a friend, and a jester to one's subjects. What matters is that to clearly discern which role is required at a given moment."

traits.locale_text: « Pour le bien de ses sujets, il faut parfois agir en tyran, en ami ou en bouffon. L'important, c'est de savoir quand incarner quel rôle. »

languages.text: "Kişi; tebaasına despot, dost ve soytarı olmalıdır. Önemli olan hangi anda hangi rolün gerektiğinin ayırdına varabilmek."
languages.original_text: "One must be a tyrant, a friend, and a jester to one's subjects. What matters is that to clearly discern which role is required at a given moment."

traits.locale_text: "Kişi tebaaları karşısında bir despot, bir dost ve bir soytarı olmalıdır. Önemli olan hangi anda hangi rolün gerektiğinin ayırdına varabilmek."
